name: Injured Harvester
description:
I made this game in 2 days for Ludum Dare 52. The theme was harvest. In the game you are a farmer that is slowly losing health, but with crops continuously growing you can keep eating to stay alive, however, there are evil farmers stealing your crops and dirt! Stop them, but whenever you touch them you take damage. People may come to help you get rid of the evil farmers, but make sure to left crops for them so they can stay alive. If there are no crops they will keep attacking the enemies until they die.

Wheat heals 1 hp and carrots heal 3.
